content: Patient with DIFFUSE MUSCLE PAIN AND STIFFNESS

children.content: Prominent weakness or elevated CK, AST, ALT?
Consider: Myositis, Drug-induced myopathy, Muscular dystrophy
History, examination, and laboratory results consistent with PMR?
Consider: Fibromyalgia, Postviral syndrome, Vitamin D deficiency
Treat for GCA, Biopsy temporal artery
